Detailed Description

CellLocation represents the location of the device. 

 // You can request an update of the current location by static function:
 CellLocation::requestLocationUpdate();

static void gaia::telephony::CellLocation::requestLocationUpdate ( ) [static]

Request an update of the current location.

If the location has changed, a broadcast will be sent to everyone registered with { PhoneStateListener LISTEN_CELL_LOCATION}.
